name: err_unauthorized
description: No token or an invalid token is attached to the request.

name: err_forbidden
description: The token attached to the request doesn't have the scope needed to access this endpoint.

name: err_page_not_found
description: The token attached to the request doesn't have the scope needed to access this endpoint.

name: err_unprocessable_data
description: There is an issue processing the body of the request.

name: err_internal_error
description: We have a problem with our server. Please try again later.
